stateDiagram

state "$initial_state" as ROOT.(InitialState)

RELEASE_DEBOUNCE

RELEASE_DEBOUNCE : RELEASE_DEBOUNCE

RELEASE_DEBOUNCE : enter / #123; timer_ms = 0#59; #125;

RELEASE_DEBOUNCE : enter / #123; output_press = false#59; #125;

state PRESSED {

        CONFIRMING_LONG

        CONFIRMING_LONG : CONFIRMING_LONG

        state "$initial_state" as PRESSED.(InitialState)

        LONG_PRESS

        LONG_PRESS : LONG_PRESS

        LONG_PRESS : enter / #123; output_long_event = true#59; #125;

}

PRESS_DEBOUNCE

PRESS_DEBOUNCE : PRESS_DEBOUNCE

PRESS_DEBOUNCE : enter / #123; timer_ms = 0#59;\noutput_press = true#59;\noutput_press_event = true#59; #125;

RELEASED

RELEASED : RELEASED

ROOT.(InitialState) --> RELEASE_DEBOUNCE

RELEASE_DEBOUNCE --> RELEASED : do [timer_ms > 50]

PRESSED --> RELEASE_DEBOUNCE : do [!input_active] / #123; output_release_event = true#59; #125;

CONFIRMING_LONG --> LONG_PRESS : do [timer_ms > 500]

PRESSED.(InitialState) --> CONFIRMING_LONG

PRESS_DEBOUNCE --> PRESSED : do [timer_ms > 50]

RELEASED --> PRESS_DEBOUNCE : do [input_active]
Events
settings
